title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.2 - Types of safety groups authorized
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.2 - Types of safety groups authorized

State Regulations
(a) The following types of safety groups are
hereby authorized: (1)
trade
groups; (2)
trade groups for risks
associated on a single job; and
(3)
trade association groups. (b) Such groups may be established when, and
only when, it has been shown to the satisfaction of the management of the State

Fund that the formation of a group will accomplish the objectives heretofore
set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
451.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
